title: It normally takes me like 5 minutes to download a new patch, but this URF update is taking so longgg
body: It's been 5 minutes and I'm still at 0%. Meanwhile my internet is working fine and is at a normal speed. PLSSSSSSS

replies.body: yeah this happened to my mate, took him like a good 2-3hours to fucking update, and he's internet we spot on, R.I.P
Very frustrating :( Might not even be able to play tonight before I have to knock off for Uni. SO gay man
i know ay, so shit, probe a riot "april fools" joke... oh well there is always tomorrow but thats a mad bummer.
5 minutes? lel takes me 20 seconds. get gud kid
Na I'm actauly pro manz. buht riet mathmakign is s0 fukd! elo hel sukcz!!!
